item.title: Clinically Grounded Agent-based Report Evaluation: An Interpretable Metric for Radiology Report Generation
item.description: arXiv:2508.02808v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Radiological imaging is central to diagnosis, treatment planning, and clinical decision-making. item.title: Highlight & Summarize: RAG without the jailbreaks
item.description: arXiv:2508.02872v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Preventing jailbreaking and model hijacking of Large Language Models (LLMs) is an important yet challenging task. item.title: Privacy-Aware Decoding: Mitigating Privacy Leakage of Large Language Models in Retrieval-Augmented Generation
item.description: arXiv:2508.03098v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) enhances the factual accuracy of large language models (LLMs) by conditioning outputs on external knowledge sources. However, when retrieval involves private or sensitive data, RAG systems are susceptible to extrac...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> RAG, retrieval, LLM, context, large language model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: A Multi-Agent System for Complex Reasoning in Radiology Visual Question Answering
item.description: arXiv:2508.02841v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Radiology visual question answering (RVQA) provides precise answers to questions about chest X-ray images, alleviating radiologists' workload. While recent methods based on multimodal large language models (MLLMs) and retrieval-augmented generation (R...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> RAG, retrieval, LLM, image, study | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> RAG, retrieval, LLM, knowledge base, framework | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
